task.title: Creating the data source login alias

titlealts.searchtitle: Creating the data source login alias

task.shortdesc: Create the data source login alias. IBM DB2 , IBM DB2 for z/OS , and Oracle Database are the databases supported.

context.p: Use the administrative console to configure a login alias for both the DB2 and Oracle data sources as follows:

step.cmd: Click New to open the Configuration screen;

info.p: where <database username> and <database password> are set to the username and password used to login to the database;

step.cmd: Click OK to confirm the changes.
